name: Tarot (jaybaus)
description:
A new computer game is not as innocent as it appears when strange and sinister events start to occur.

This is my second Bitsy game - the first one was for the "Ghost" Bitsy Jam and this one is for the "Tarot" Bitsy Jam.

I wanted to create a simple font in Bitsy with one letter per tile and also had an idea to make a Bitsy game set in a computer where the avatar is the cursor, so I combined the two for this game.

I hope you enjoy it! :)
